name: English Dictionary
description: - This is English Dictionary. It has more than 200.000 words. - You can view pronunciation, syllables of a lot of common words. - You can bookmark a word and review later. - You can view 1000 basic English words easily. - You can view 3000 common English words easily. - You can view synonyms words and navigate easily. - You can adjust speech rate into slow, normal or fast. - You can hear US or UK voice easily. - You can hear sound of any word even that word not found in the system.
